svg.text: Vehicle-to-vehicle control system, as designed by U. Penn for Mobies. The controller in FollowingPlatoon is a modal controller with the objective of following the LeadingPlatoon.

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (dist - lambdaV*myVel <= elow2 +epsE + lambdaP) && (lambdaV * myVel - dist <= -elow2 - lambdaP)

property.name: guardExpression
property.value: (dist - lambdaV * myVel <= eup1+lambdaP) && (lambdaV * myVel - dist <= epsE - eup1 - lambdaP)

entity.name: TimedSinewave
entity.doc: This composite actor generates a timed sine wave.
